group_1.narration: Iroha, I try to live each day in a good light,@kept alive by the future you gave us.
As time passes, those of us tormented by@our feelings of guilt and helplessness find@ourselves gradually able to lift our heads,@and able to stride into a new day.
After you guys left, thanks to the efforts of@Mifuyu, Kanagi, and Hinano, the Magical Girls of@Kamihama have begun to rise to their own two feet.
So maybe it's about time I stopped overworking@myself and spent some time relaxing...

group_1.textCenter: I really do feel Iroha's presence here.@It's stronger than it was at the radio tower.

group_1.textRight: Maybe this place has some kinda connection to@where Iroha and the others are.

group_1.textLeft: From what I can surmise of the flow of magic,@I think you're spot on.
Thank you for letting us know@about this, Kagome.

group_1.textRight: No need to thank me, Aru was the one@who sensed it.
<We split up and searched for information@on Iroha!>

group_1.textLeft: Thank you, Aru. I'm very grateful.
Then let's bring everyone here for a@picnic sometime.
...I'd rather stay, but I better get to my@next appointment.
I'm having an interview about the Kamihama@Student Conference for a local magazine.

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah, you're getting some ground meat on@the way back, aren'tcha? Don't forget, got it?!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I know. We're having Iroha's hamburg steak@for dinner, right?
Alright, I'm off.

group_1.textRight: It's just like you said, rumors about the East and@the West can take on a life of their own.
Without both sides interacting with one another,@they'd just keep talking past each other.

group_1.textLeft: By total chance, our paths crossed and we@became involved with each other.
Through that, we came to learn each other's@personalities and histories,
and realized that what we were told didn't align@with how things really were.
And now we're all irreplaceable friends.

group_1.textRight: What was the catalyst for such an extraordinary@relationship?

group_1.textLeft: That is...
For most of us, we're in a sort of Kamihama City@alliance group...
Oh, it's different in my case.
(...Come to think of it, without Iroha, the East and@the West wouldn't be where they are now...)
(I've known Kanagi ever since that clash between@the East and West...)
(But if Iroha had never come to Kamihama City@to look for Ui,)
(we never would have come together like@we are now...)
(And if Iroha never made her wish to begin with,@the Magius would never have come to exist.)
(We wouldn't have had an enemy to work@together to overcome...)
Sorry. I think it was one girl in particular who@influenced me...

group_1.textRight: Is she why you got involved with the East?

group_1.textLeft: Yes. In fact, most of our current members were@inspired by her.

group_1.textRight: We'll need to include her in an interview@next time!

group_1.textLeft: That might be difficult.
She's...not here anymore.@No longer by my side...
